Package org.jruyi.core

JRuyi Core Package Version 2.3

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IBufferFactory
    A buffer factory to create and manage buffers.
    IBufferFactory.IConfiguration
    This interface defines methods to configure a buffer factory.
    IChannelAdminConfiguration
    This interface defines methods to configure channel admin.
    IFileKeyStoreBuilder
    A builder to build a new ISslContextParameters backed by file-based key/trust stores which are used to initialize an SSL context.
    IFilterChain
    A filter chain is a container of IFilters that process data in series.
    INioService<I,O,C>
    An event based IO service using Java NIO.
    IScheduler
    A scheduler is used to schedule tasks to run at a certain time or run periodically.
    IScheduler.IConfiguration
    This interface defines the methods to configure a scheduler.
    ISslFilterBuilder
    A builder to build an ssl filter.
    ITcpClientBuilder
    A builder to build an NIO service of TCP client.
    ITcpClientConfiguration
    This interface defines methods to configure a TCP client service.
    ITcpConnPoolConfiguration
    This interface defines methods to configure a TCP client of type ConnPool or MuxConnPool.
    ITcpServerBuilder
    A builder to build an NIO service of TCP server.
    ITcpServerConfiguration
    This interface defines methods to configure a TCP server service.
    ITextLineFilterBuilder
    A builder to build a textline filter.
    IUdpClientBuilder
    A builder to build an NIO serivce of UDP client.
    IUdpClientConfiguration
    This interface defines methods to configure a UDP client service.
    IUdpServerBuilder
    A builder to build an NIO service of UDP server.
    IUdpServerConfiguration
    This interface defines methods to configure a UDP server service.
    RuyiCore.IRuyiCore
    This interface defines all the methods that a RuyiCore provider has to implement.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RuyiCore
    A holder for Scheduler and TimeoutAdmin services.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ISslFilterBuilder.ClientAuth
    Defines the possible values for property clientAuth.
    ISslFilterBuilder.EndpointIdAlg
    Defines the possible values for property endpointIdentificationAlgorithm.

Package org.jruyi.core Description
